name: Project Cthulhu (in early development)
description:
Unnamed(buggy) lovecraftian based action game, planned release on steam Summer 2022. For the best experience I highly recommend downloading the zip instead of the WebGL build. Track its development here, https://discord.gg/YcXgzAfk4m .  The WebGL launches in a fixed tiny res that doesn't do justice in the game, and I'm unsure why.

(Disclaimer: although the game will be heavily influenced and related to the Cthulhu mythos, it won't stay completely faithful for the sake of gameplay)

KNOWN BUGS:

have to double tap numbers for weapon switch to fully take place sometimes, some animations unresponsive, quarterstaff equip animation stuck if switched to while moving, projectiles are an absolute mess
